entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 60 percent chance of rain showers near noon. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Snow level rising to 2300 metres this afternoon. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this afternoon. High 11. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Snow level 2300 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
